response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its true worth and the unique opportunity it presents, I am offering you the chance to acquire it for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 9500}
